content:
I'd be happy to help you troubleshoot the issue with your Netflix account!

Sorry to hear that you're experiencing poor video quality and having to restart the app multiple times. That can be frustrating!

Regarding your recent viewing history, I'm glad you enjoyed Season 3 of "The Crown"! However, I want to focus on resolving the issue you're experiencing.

To better assist you, can you please provide some more details about the problem? Here are some questions to help me narrow down the cause:

1. What device are you using to stream Netflix (e.g., smart TV, laptop, mobile device, streaming device like Roku or Chromecast)?
2. Have you noticed any error messages or codes when the video quality is poor or the app crashes?
3. How often does this issue occur? Is it every time you try to stream, or is it intermittent?
4. Have you tried checking your internet connection speed? A minimum speed of 5 Mbps is recommended for standard definition (SD) streaming, 25 Mbps for high definition (HD), and 50 Mbps for ultra-high definition (UHD).
5. Have you recently installed any new software or apps on your device that might be interfering with Netflix?
6. Are you using a VPN (Virtual Private Network) or proxy server?

Please provide any additional information that might be helpful in resolving the issue. I'll do my best to guide you through the troubleshooting process and get you back to enjoying your favorite shows in no time!
